items.content_html: nextpersist is a lightweight utility for managing local storage in React and Next.js applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, getting, and deleting items in local storage with support for a parent key to namespace the stored data.
items.title: nextmasterygit/lightweight-localstorage: nextpersist is a lightweight utility for managing local storage in React and Next.js applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, getting, and deleting items in local storage with support for a parent key to namespace the stored data.
